Constant Field Values

Contents

  • decasestudy.*

decasestudy.*

  • decasestudy.Queries 
    Modifier and Type Constant Field Value
    public static final java.lang.String queryCheckCustomer "SELECT * FROM CDW_SAPP_CUSTOMER WHERE SSN=%d AND CREDIT_CARD_NO=\'%s\';"
    public static final java.lang.String queryFindNumberValuesState "SELECT COUNT(TRANSACTION_ID), SUM(TRANSACTION_VALUE) FROM CDW_SAPP_CREDITCARD JOIN CDW_SAPP_BRANCH WHERE CDW_SAPP_BRANCH.BRANCH_STATE = \'TX\';"
    public static final java.lang.String queryFindNumberValuesTransaction "SELECT COUNT(TRANSACTION_ID), SUM(TRANSACTION_VALUE) FROM CDW_SAPP_CREDITCARD WHERE TRANSACTION_TYPE = \'%s\' GROUP BY TRANSACTION_TYPE;"
    public static final java.lang.String queryFindTransactionsZipMonthYear "SELECT * FROM CDW_SAPP_CREDITCARD JOIN CDW_SAPP_CUSTOMER ON CDW_SAPP_CUSTOMER.SSN = CDW_SAPP_CREDITCARD.CUST_SSN WHERE CDW_SAPP_CUSTOMER.CUST_ZIP = %d AND CDW_SAPP_CREDITCARD.MONTH = %d AND CDW_SAPP_CREDITCARD.YEAR = %d ORDER BY CDW_SAPP_CREDITCARD.DAY DESC;"
    public static final java.lang.String queryGetExistingAccount "SELECT * FROM CDW_SAPP_CUSTOMER WHERE SSN=%d;"
    public static final java.lang.String queryModifyExistingAccount "UPDATE CDW_SAPP_CUSTOMER SET FIRST_NAME=\'%s\', MIDDLE_NAME=\'%s\', LAST_NAME=\'%s\', CREDIT_CARD_NO=\'%s\', APT_NO=\'%s\', STREET_NAME=\'%s\', CUST_CITY=\'%s\', CUST_STATE=\'%s\', CUST_COUNTRY=\'%s\', CUST_ZIP=\'%s\', CUST_PHONE=%d, CUST_EMAIL=\'%s\', LAST_UPDATED=\'%s\' WHERE SSN=%d;"
    public static final java.lang.String queryMonthlyBillCreditCard "SELECT CREDIT_CARD_NO, SUM(TRANSACTION_VALUE) FROM CDW_SAPP_CREDITCARD WHERE CREDIT_CARD_NO = \'%s\' AND MONTH = %d AND YEAR = %d;"
    public static final java.lang.String queryTransactionsBetweenDates "SELECT TRANSACTION_ID, DAY, MONTH, YEAR, CREDIT_CARD_NO, CUST_SSN, BRANCH_CODE, TRANSACTION_TYPE, TRANSACTION_VALUE FROM CDW_SAPP_CREDITCARD WHERE DATE(CONCAT(YEAR, \'-\', MONTH, \'-\', DAY)) BETWEEN \'%d-%d-%d\' AND \'%d-%d-%d\' ORDER BY DATE(CONCAT(YEAR, \'-\', MONTH, \'-\', DAY)) DESC;"
